General.Name: Nanjing Chixia Development Co Ltd
General.Description: Nanjing Chixia Development Co.,Ltd. engages in the real estate business in China. The company is also involved in the real estate development, construction, leasing, and sale activities; provision of after-sale services; engineering construction management activities; and sale of building materials, decorative materials, lighting fixtures, and metal materials. In addition, it operates department stores; and provides interior decoration design and industrial investment services. The company was founded in 1984 and is based in Nanjing, China.
